UserOnboarding.businessChannelQuestion: What field is your account in?
UserOnboarding.businessChannelHint: ViralChef is the master chef of promotion on social media. We blend the ingredients people love to craft strategies that highlight your brand, build close-knit communities, and drive growthâ€”smart, swift, and always friendly.
UserOnboarding.expertQuestion: What kind of expert are you?
UserOnboarding.expertHint: I'm a marketer with 7 years of experience. I've partnered with global companies and repeatedly led localization strategies that helped U.S. brands expand into the Asia-Pacific region. My expertise lies in crafting digital experiences that transcend borders and languages.

SocialOnboarding.title: Tell us about your profile
SocialOnboarding.description: Help us understand your {platform} account to create better content
SocialOnboarding.profileDescriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your account, your target audience, the type of content you create, and what makes your profile unique...
SocialOnboarding.profileDescriptionHint: The more details you provide, the better we can help you create engaging content.
SocialOnboarding.exampleDescriptionContent: I'm a digital marketing specialist focused on helping small businesses grow their online presence. I share practical tips about social media marketing, content creation, and customer engagement. My audience includes small business owners, marketers, and entrepreneurs looking to build their brand online. What makes me unique is my focus on budget-friendly strategies that deliver real results.

pricing.title: Unlock the full potential of Twyn
pricing.subtitle: During our beta period, take advantage of all features at no cost.

freeFeatures.feature1: AI-assisted content generation (limit: 50 posts or comment interactions per month)
freeFeatures.feature2: Basic topic suggestions based on your profile
freeFeatures.feature4: Community support via Discord (beta users only)

proFeatures.feature2: Increased AI interaction limits (1,000 posts or comment interactions per month)
proFeatures.feature4: Analytics to track your best-performing posts

proPlusFeatures.feature2: Increased AI interaction limits (3,000 posts or comment interactions per month)
proPlusFeatures.feature4: Exclusive access to advanced content strategy tips and premium support

questions.q1: How long can I use Twyn for free?
questions.a1: During the beta period, you can use Twyn for free with reasonable limits. The exact duration will be announced as we approach the end of the beta.
questions.q2: Are there usage limits during the beta period?
questions.a2: Yes, there are reasonable limits in place during the beta period to ensure system stability and fair usage for all users.
questions.q3: What happens after the beta period?
questions.a3: After the beta period ends, Twyn will transition to a paid subscription model. Beta users will receive early notice, special offers, and smooth migration support.
questions.q4: Do I need a Threads account to use Twyn?
questions.a4: Yes, Twyn integrates directly with Threads. You need to connect your Threads account to post, schedule, and manage content.
questions.q5: What are AI-powered interactions in Twyn?
questions.a5: AI-powered interactions in Twyn include automated content generation, tone optimization, smart scheduling, and context-aware comment repliesâ€”all designed to save you time and keep you consistent.
questions.q6: Can I purchase additional AI interactions with my Twyn subscription?
questions.a6: Additional AI interaction packages will be available after the beta period. Pricing and add-on options will be announced before the official launch.
